response.overview: Why is our tax system so complicated? Teachers have long relied on educational cartoons with catchy songs to simplify everything from grammar to government. Can a cartoon conquer a challenge like today’s tax system, with its ever-changing, 75,000 pages of laws? With retro flair, TAXATION NATION looks into how our tax system does, and doesn’t work. The eleventh film in the WE THE ECONOMY series.
response.title: Taxation Nation
